output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

RBI_CHEMO_data<-read_csv("./RBI_CHEMO_data")

RBIplot.abs<- 
  ggplot(RBI_CHEMO_data, aes(x=RBI_value_ind_noncatch, y=linregs))+
  geom_point()

RBIplot.abs<- 
  ggplot(RBI_CHEMO_data, aes(x=RBI_value_ind_noncatch, y=linregs.abs))+
  geom_point()

print(RBIplot)
print(RBIplot.abs)

RBI_ind_noncatch_lm<-lm(linregs~RBI_value_ind_noncatch, RBI_CHEMO_data)

RBI_ind_noncatch_abs_lm<-lm(linregs.abs~RBI_value_ind_noncatch, RBI_CHEMO_data)

summary(RBI_ind_noncatch_lm)
#summary(RBI_ind_noncatch_abs_lm)
```
